title: Groups of Viruses 2
author: ayobami
description: Examine yourself on questions about various exmaples of viruses in various groups...

questions.text: Herpes Simplex Virus <A>, Norovirus <B>, Hepatitis B <C>, Poxvirus <D>, Varicella Zoster <E>, Human Immunodeficiency Virus <F>, Poliovirus <G>, Rhinovirus <H>, Ebola Virus<I>
questions.question: <A> is a Group I virus

questions.question: only 2 of the aforementioned are examples of Group I viruses
Herpes Simplex Virus type 2 tends to have clinical manifestations mainly below the waist
Respiratory Syncytial Virus, a single stranded RNA virus, uses reverse transcriptase to create it's mRNA
